website_summaries.verdict: A nice-looking option for younger kids ages 2 to 6.
pros: Comes in several different looks, all blue
Made from a soft silicone material that is flexible and gentle on the hair
cons: Some buyers felt this option was not easy to put on
Some may find the material to be a little flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute little swim cap for my son
customer_reviews.text: Super cute little swim cap for my son. I honestly got this for him because i thought it was adorable and wanted to take some pictures of him in it and his matching little shark swimming onesie. It looks so cute on him, and it's actually a great quality swim cap as well - does what it's made to do! Over all happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Aly

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it. First one was used about 3 times ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. My kids love it. First one was used about 3 times a week for about 8-9 months. Ordered the same piece second time.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 3 yr old daughter for her swim lessons. I like it very much. Keeps her hair mostly dry. It does slip up a little through the lesson which is why some hair gets wet. Don’t know if it’s possible for them to not slip up at all in general. This is cute pink swim cap that my daughter loves.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: love the quality and my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the money, love the quality and my son loves it. it's light weight and comfortable for my Kid.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Cherukuri

customer_reviews.title: Baby love it
customer_reviews.text: Baby and mom love this so much .they look great and fit very good in my 3 years old baby ,was looking for the pink but was not an option when i bought it. Will buy it again if i need diffrent color
customer_reviews.author: mar3ash

customer_reviews.title: Cute fishy swim cap for girls!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was always the cutest kid in swim class, but now outrageously so. This swim cap is adorable, fits great, and keeps her hair dry and out of her eyes. We always get compliments.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer143

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very cute Fit well with large puffy hair Daughter loved it Covered her ears Cons: Hair was still wet Broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Arlette

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is too cute and it keeps my sons hair dry😊
customer_reviews.author: Yogagirl38

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't keep her hair dry and it tore after two wears.
customer_reviews.author: Lee P/

customer_reviews.title: ... kids - but my grown sons are having more fun wearing these
customer_reviews.text: Bought several for the little kids - but my grown sons are having more fun wearing these. Well made and kids WANT to wear them. Helps keep water out of their ears too!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is very stretchy, so it is easy to put on my daughters head. Unlike other swim caps that don't stretch as much.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Not Speedos Quality material. Stimulated my son who loves Dory and it reminded him of Dory.
customer_reviews.text: It was very thin and flimsy material. When I tried to put it over my child’s hair it does not completely cover up his hair. I tried pulling it closer to the hair lone and it ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Teisa Salmon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The cap is of poor quality. It tore in less than 2 weeks since I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Manu Mishra

customer_reviews.title: Fits toddler
customer_reviews.text: Swim cap fits my 15 month old, but she does have a lot of hair. It is durable so far and keeps water out her ears. Her hair also stays pretty dry. She did get ahold of the cap and bit into it. I just put a little super glue on and it still works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Shantell

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back already the beginning of the week
customer_reviews.author: francisca

customer_reviews.title: defective piece
customer_reviews.text: I received the cap with a small hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Vineet Srivastava

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It was torn apart after one use. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J.H

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Ripped apart..
customer_reviews.text: Really bad quality. Just used twice & it ripped apart.. won't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nishad

product_meta.title: WELKOOM Swimming Cap for Kids, High Elastic Silicone Toddler Swim Cap, Bathing Cap,Fun Design for Children, Boys and Girls, Keep Hair Clean Ear Dry, Aged 2-6
product_meta.description:
Enjoy the water with fun animal designs. Kids will love the protruding fish fin. Nothing makes swimming more fun than this cap. The DS Fish Swim Cap is made with a soft, 100% silicone construction and offers a durable, comfortable fit throughout their swim. Plus, anti-slip edges keep it on your kid’s head no matter how much they splash around. Designed for swimmers age 2 up to 6. 

Fun for All Kids: 
★Fun protruding fin. 
★Sized for children 
★Anti-slip interior grip 
★Easy to put on and take off 
★Reduces pressure around head. 
★Bold colors are easy to see in the water 
★100% silicone 
Washing Instructions: 
★Rinse in clean cold water and wipe dry after use. 
★Dry the cap naturally, don’t leave in direct sunlight. 
★A light sprinkling of talcum powder will keep the cap in perfect condition. 
★Avoid contact with sharp objects. 

Add to cart and bring it home. Just enjoy the pool time with your kids this summer.!
feature_bullets: ★Fun for all kids. The bold colors are easy to see in the water, add some excitement to your child’s swim lessons with this fish swim cap. Kids will love the protruding fin and will be actually excited to swim like a fish!

★Sized for children. The silicone swim cap is a great choice for beginners and casual swimmers. It not only helps keep your child’s hair safe and protected, but it propels children in the water faster. Smaller size fits most children (Ages: 2-6).

★Comfortable , Snug Fit. The DS swimming cap is extremely comfortable and durable. Keeps hair pulled cleanly away from face and neck while swimming. And the soft silicone material make it more easier to get on and take off. Reduces pressure around head.

★High Quality Material. The swim cap for kids is constructed with 100% green and skin friendly silicone. The new technology specially designed silicone is gentler on the hair, more tear resistant and more flexible.

★100% satisfaction guarantee. Customer satisfaction is our greatest pursuit, we guarantee to provide our customer with best product &service. If you have any question, welcome to contact the mail: hengfengds@hotmail.com. Welcome to order!
